net.tridentsdk

Class PingInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.tridentsdk.PingInfo

  • public class PingInfo
extends Object
    Information displayed to the client in the server list
    Since:
    0.3-alpha-DP
    Author:
    The TridentSDK Team

      PingInfo() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int maxPlayers()
      Gets the maximum number of players allowed on the server
      String motd()
      A string containing the current broadcast MOTD of the server
      BufferedImage motdImage()
      Gets the BufferedImage that represents the Motd picture sent to clients
      File motdPicture()
      Returns the File that represents the picture displayed next to the server listing on clients
      int playerCount()
      Obtains the amount of players on the server
      int setMotdImage(BufferedImage image)
      Sets the MOTD image sent to clients, may or may not take a server restart to take effect
      String version()
      Obtains the highest minecraft server version which supports clients

    • Method Detail

      • motd

        public String motd()
        A string containing the current broadcast MOTD of the server
        Returns:
        a string containing the MOTD of the server, may be empty, never null

      • motdPicture

        public File motdPicture()
        Returns the File that represents the picture displayed next to the server listing on clients
        Returns:
        the file that represents the picture sent to clients when they ping the server
        See Also:
        for the representing the image sent to clients

      • motdImage

        public BufferedImage motdImage()
        Gets the BufferedImage that represents the Motd picture sent to clients
        Returns:
        the image sent to clients
        See Also:
        for the file itself

      • version

        public String version()
        Obtains the highest minecraft server version which supports clients
        Returns:
        the minecraft server version

      • setMotdImage

        public int setMotdImage(BufferedImage image)
        Sets the MOTD image sent to clients, may or may not take a server restart to take effect
        Parameters:
        image - the image to set it to
        Returns:
        0 for success, -1 if this feature is disabled in config, -2 for generic failure

      • maxPlayers

        public int maxPlayers()
        Gets the maximum number of players allowed on the server
        Returns:
        the maximum number of players the server will allow

      • playerCount

        public int playerCount()
        Obtains the amount of players on the server
        Returns:
        the amount of players on the server
